text: Heinz Bigler (21 December 1925 – 20 June 2002) was a Swiss football player. He played as a midfielder. He was born in Bern, Switzerland. Bigler played for Switzerland in the 1954 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Suíça 1954 He also played for BSC Young Boys. Bigler died on 20 June 2002 at the age of 76.Heinz Bigler gestorben == References == == Other websites == * FIFA profile Category:1925 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Sportspeople from Bern
title: Heinz Bigler
